delivery-text: Pick-up and delivery of your vehicle at home or at work
hero-subtitle: Specialists in high-end detailing in Combloux...
services-subtitle: Premium services to enhance and protect your vehicle
service-1-desc: Thorough interior/exterior cleaning and mechanical decontamination to remove all impurities.
service-2-desc: Defect correction up to 90% and long-lasting ceramic protection for a radiant bodywork.
service-3-desc: Color change, paint protection and complete customization of your vehicle.
service-4-desc: Installation of starlight ceiling, ambient LED, dashcam and all accessories to customize the interior.
testimonial-1-text: Exceptional work on my Porsche. The polishing and ceramic protection transformed the car. Professional and passionate team. Highly recommend!
testimonial-2-text: The Comfort Plus Delivery service is great! They picked up my car at home and brought it back spotless. The installed starlight ceiling is magnificent. Thanks Pauline and Osama!
testimonial-3-text: Complete wrapping of my SUV, result beyond my expectations. Perfect finishes, wise advice. Reasonable prices for the quality of work. I'll be back!
contact-subtitle: Fill in the form or contact us directly
cleaning-hero-subtitle: Give your vehicle a fresh start with our interior and exterior cleaning formulas. Impeccable results guaranteed.
cleaning-formulas-subtitle: Services adapted to all needs and budgets
cleaning-detailing-1: Detailed exterior washing - Engine compartment + fuel flap + door surrounds
cleaning-detailing-3: Wax application on bodywork + tire shine
cleaning-detailing-5: Steam cleaning of air vents + air freshener
cleaning-premium-1: Exterior washing + door surrounds + fuel flap
cleaning-decontamination-text: Remove deeply embedded contaminants from your bodywork: tar, rust spots, salt, resin, road and industrial pollution. This service uses a clay bar and professional chemical products to mechanically extract all impurities that regular washing cannot remove.
cleaning-decontamination-benefit-1: Essential preparation before polishing or ceramic protection
cleaning-decontamination-benefit-2: Restores smoothness and shine to paint
alacarte-1-desc: Meticulous bodywork washing with professional products and careful drying.
alacarte-2-desc: Deep cleaning of fabric seats with extraction of embedded dirt.
alacarte-3-desc: Leather cleaning and nourishing to preserve its suppleness and shine.
alacarte-4-desc: Complete removal of pet hair embedded in fabrics and carpets.
alacarte-5-desc: Complete engine compartment degreasing with steam, safe for electronics.
alacarte-6-desc: Treatment of difficult stains and elimination of stubborn odors.
alacarte-7-desc: Roof lining shampooing to remove marks and restore original appearance.
alacarte-8-desc: Polishing and protecting optics to restore transparency and safety.
alacarte-9-desc: Defect correction on a specific panel (hood, door, fender...).
cleaning-delivery-text: We pick up your vehicle at home or at your workplace, perform the cleaning in our facility, then deliver it perfectly clean. Available in Combloux, Megève, Chamonix, Sallanches and throughout Haute-Savoie.
cleaning-final-cta-title: Ready to Restore Your Vehicle's Shine?
cleaning-final-cta-text: Contact us now for a personalized quote or to book your slot - Please empty your vehicle before any service
cleaning-intro-text: Professional cleaning preserves your vehicle's value, protects your health and improves your driving comfort. Our expert techniques eliminate dirt, bacteria and bad odors deep down.
cleaning-benefit-1-text: Preserves your bodywork and interiors against wear and external aggressions.
cleaning-benefit-2-text: Our professional techniques guarantee deep cleaning, without residue.
cleaning-benefit-3-text: Comfort Plus Delivery Service: we pick up and deliver your vehicle wherever you want.
faq-subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions
faq-q1: Must I empty my vehicle before dropping it off?
faq-a1: We ask our customers to empty their vehicle before bringing it to us. This is to avoid any suspicion or risk of deterioration. Additional fees may apply if the vehicle is not emptied.
faq-q2: What is the difference between the Detailing and Premium Formula?
faq-a2: The Detailing Formula is our most comprehensive service: it includes bodywork chemical decontamination, engine compartment cleaning, protective wax application and complete leather treatment. The Premium Formula is a more standard service, ideal for regular maintenance with interior/exterior washing and careful finishing.
faq-q3: How long does a complete cleaning take?
faq-a3: A Premium Formula takes about 3 hours. The Detailing Formula requires about 6 hours depending on the vehicle's condition and size. We take the necessary time to guarantee an impeccable result without rushing.
faq-q4: Is the Comfort Plus Delivery service included in the price?
faq-a4: The pick-up and delivery service for your vehicle is available on quote depending on your location. It is included for Combloux and may incur an additional charge for more distant municipalities. Contact us to know the exact rate according to your address.
faq-q5: Do I need to book in advance?
faq-a5: Yes, we work by appointment only to guarantee quality service and respected deadlines. We advise you to book a week in advance preferably, especially during busy periods (school holidays, winter season in Megève/Chamonix).
faq-a6: We use high-end professional products, environmentally friendly and safe for your vehicle. Our shampoos and detergents are biodegradable and our techniques limit water consumption thanks to the use of low-consumption Karcher (50L of water per vehicle versus over 150L for roller washing).
faq-q7: Can I combine several à la carte services?
faq-a7: Absolutely! Our à la carte services are designed to be combined according to your needs. Contact us to create a personalized quote: we can for example combine exterior detailing wash + headlight restoration + leather seat shampooing.
faq-q8: Do you work on all types of vehicles?
faq-a8: Yes, we work on all types of vehicles: sedans, SUVs, sports cars, vans, motorcycles, trucks. Our rates are adapted according to size and vehicle type. The prices indicated are for standard sedans/SUVs, a personalized quote will be established for specific vehicles.
faq-q9: What if my vehicle is very dirty or neglected?
faq-a9: No problem! We specialize in renovating very dirty vehicles. We recommend the Detailing Formula with possibly additional services (pet hair add-on, stubborn stain treatment, 40% polishing per panel, headlight restoration...). Send us photos for an accurate quote.
renovation-hero-subtitle: Restore shine and brilliance to your vehicle with our professional buffing, polishing and ceramic protection services. Preserve the value and aesthetics of your bodywork sustainably.
renovation-services-subtitle: Two complementary expertises to enhance and protect your vehicle
renovation-service-1-desc: Correction of micro-scratches and paint defects to restore your bodywork's original shine. Two polishing levels available according to your vehicle's condition.
renovation-feature-1-3: Buffing for shine and protection (3 months)
renovation-service-2-desc: Long-lasting protection against external aggressions. Choose between traditional wax (6 months) or high-performance ceramic (up to 5 years).
renovation-intro-title: Why Renovate and Protect Your Bodywork?
renovation-intro-text: Your vehicle's bodywork is daily subjected to external aggressions: UV, pollution, insects, micro-scratches. Our professional treatments restore the original shine and sustainably protect your investment.
renovation-benefit-1-text: Well-maintained bodywork maintains your vehicle's resale value and testifies to careful maintenance.
renovation-benefit-2-text: Our ceramic treatments protect your paint against UV, oxidation and contaminants for up to 5 years.
renovation-benefit-3-text: Polishing eliminates up to 90% of micro-scratches and gives incomparable shine to your bodywork.
renovation-process-subtitle: A rigorous method for professional and lasting results
renovation-step-1-text: Deep removal of all embedded contaminants: tar, resin, metallic pollution.
renovation-step-2-text: Correction of micro-scratches and paint defects with our professional precision polishers.
renovation-step-3-text: Application of chosen protection (wax or ceramic) for optimal durability and shine.
renovation-testimonial-1: 90% polishing on my BMW, spectacular result! The bodywork shines like new. Meticulous and professional work. Highly recommend.
renovation-testimonial-2: 3-year ceramic protection applied 6 months ago, my car stays impeccable effortlessly. Water slides off, no marks, ultra-simplified maintenance. Investment paid off!
renovation-testimonial-3: Impeccable service from start to finish. Wise advice on choosing between wax and ceramic. My Audi has regained all its shine after polishing. Very professional.
renovation-final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized diagnosis and a custom quote adapted to your vehicle's condition and needs.
polishing-hero-subtitle: Paint defect correction and restoration of your bodywork's original shine. Elimination of up to 90% of micro-scratches with our professional detailing techniques.
polishing-formulas-subtitle: Choose the correction level adapted to your bodywork's condition
polishing-40-description: Light to moderate surface defect correction. Ideal for recent or regularly maintained vehicles with superficial micro-scratches and slight paint dulling.
polishing-40-feature-2: Elimination of up to 40% of micro-scratches
polishing-40-feature-4: Shiny and smooth to touch finish
polishing-40-recommendation: Recommended before a sale or after a purchase
polishing-90-description: Deep and intensive paint defect correction. Recommended for old, neglected vehicles or those with numerous scratches, holograms and heavily oxidized paint.
polishing-90-feature-2: Elimination of up to 90% of micro-scratches
polishing-90-recommendation: Recommended with additional protection (wax or ceramic)
polishing-intro-text: Polishing is a paint correction process that eliminates micro-scratches, holograms, oxidation traces and surface defects. Through rotary or orbital machines and specific abrasive products, we remove a thin layer of clear coat to reveal a perfectly smooth and shiny surface.
polishing-benefit-1-text: Correction of micro-scratches, automatic wash marks, holograms and paint veils.
polishing-benefit-2-text: Gives mirror shine and incomparable color depth to your bodywork.
polishing-benefit-3-text: Perfectly smooth surface essential before applying wax or ceramic protection.
polishing-lustrage-text: Buffing is a complementary treatment that follows polishing. It consists of applying a finishing product that nourishes the paint, intensifies shine and offers temporary protection against external aggressions. Buffing also facilitates maintenance by making the bodywork less porous.
polishing-lustrage-difference: Polishing / buffing difference: Polishing corrects defects, buffing protects and enhances the result obtained.
polishing-testimonial-1: 90% polishing on my Porsche 911. Absolutely stunning result, the paint shines like never! Meticulous and professional work. A true enthusiast who takes his time.
polishing-testimonial-2: My Audi had many micro-scratches from automatic washes. The 40% polishing was enough to restore a new appearance. I recommend this service!
polishing-testimonial-3: Excellent value for polishing. Precise advice on the formula adapted to my vehicle. Result up to my expectations, mirror bodywork!
faq-polishing-q1: What's the difference between 40% and 90% polishing?
faq-polishing-a1: The percentage indicates the defect correction rate. 40% polishing eliminates superficial micro-scratches and suits recent vehicles. 90% polishing is deep correction treating significant scratches, oxidation and marked defects. It requires more time (2 days vs 1 day) and is mandatory before ceramic protection.
faq-polishing-a2: No, if done correctly by a professional. Polishing removes a thin layer of clear coat (a few microns) to eliminate surface defects. Our machines and techniques guarantee controlled and safe polishing. A vehicle can be polished 4 to 6 times in its life without risk.
faq-polishing-q3: How long does the polishing result last?
faq-polishing-a3: The polishing itself is permanent: corrected defects don't come back. However, shine and protection decrease over time without maintenance. This is why we recommend applying wax (6 months) or ceramic (2 to 5 years) after polishing to sustainably protect the result.
faq-polishing-a4: Yes, absolutely. Decontamination eliminates embedded contaminants (tar, resin, metallic pollution) that don't come off with regular washing. Without this step, polishing risks embedding these particles even deeper and scratching the paint. It's an essential step for optimal and safe results.
faq-polishing-q5: Can I have a black/dark car polished?
faq-polishing-a5: Yes! Dark paints (black, navy blue, anthracite gray) reveal defects more but also benefit from spectacular results after polishing. Color depth and mirror shine are particularly impressive on dark shades. We have the expertise to treat all paint types.
faq-polishing-a6: After polishing, favor hand washes with pH neutral products and soft microfibers. Avoid automatic brush washes that create micro-scratches. Regularly apply a detailing spray to maintain shine. Ideally, complete with protection (wax or ceramic) to preserve the result.
polishing-final-cta-title: Ready to Restore Your Bodywork's Shine?
polishing-final-cta-text: Contact us for a free diagnosis and personalized advice on the polishing formula adapted to your vehicle.
protection-hero-subtitle: Long-lasting protection against external aggressions. Hydrophobic effect, intense shine and ease of maintenance. Choose between traditional wax (6 months) or high-performance ceramic (up to 5 years).
protection-comparison-title: Wax or Ceramic: Which Protection to Choose?
protection-comparison-subtitle: Two solutions adapted to your needs and budget
protection-wax-description: Traditional protection offering intense shine and intermediate protection. Ideal for controlled budget with regular renewal. Application after 40% or 90% polishing.
protection-wax-note: Perfect for a first level of protection
protection-ceramic-description: High-performance protection with exceptional hydrophobic effect. Durability up to 5 years for premium vehicles. Maximum resistance to chemical and UV aggressions. 90% polishing mandatory.
protection-ceramic-note: The ultimate protection for your vehicle
protection-extras-title: Ceramic Protection on Elements (à la carte)
protection-extras-subtitle: Complete your protection with specific treatments on your vehicle's sensitive areas - prices on quote
protection-extra-wheels-desc: Ceramic protection against brake dust, salt and splashes. Simplified cleaning.
protection-extra-wheels-desc-short: Ceramic protection against brake dust and salt
protection-extra-glass-desc: Hydrophobic treatment for windshield and windows. Optimal visibility in rain, water slides off.
protection-extra-leather-desc: Maintenance and protection of leather seats and trims. Anti-stain, softening and maintenance.
protection-extra-leather-desc-short: Maintenance and anti-stain protection for leather seats
protection-extra-plastics-desc: Renovation and protection of plastics (bumpers, side skirts). Lasting anti-whitening.
protection-extra-fabric-desc: Waterproofing protection for fabric seats and carpets. Liquid and solid anti-stain.
protection-extra-convertible-desc: Waterproofing and UV protection for fabric tops. Prevents infiltration and discoloration.
protection-extra-headlights-desc: Renovation and protection of yellowed or opaque optics. Restore perfect visibility.
protection-extra-upholstery-desc: Integral protection of all interior elements: seats, door panels, headliner.
protection-extra-upholstery-desc-short: Integral protection of all interior elements
protection-extra-alloygator-desc: Rigid anti-scratch protection between tire and wheel to avoid any friction (curbs etc...).
protection-extra-alloygator-desc-short: Rigid anti-scratch protection between tire and wheel to avoid any friction (curbs etc...).
protection-extras-mobile-subtitle: Complete your protection with specific treatments
protection-process-subtitle: A rigorous 4-step method for optimal and lasting protection
protection-step-1-desc: Complete removal of all contaminants: tar, resin, metallic pollution.
protection-step-2-desc: Deep 90% correction to obtain a perfectly smooth and flawless surface.
protection-step-3-desc: Multi-layer application of ceramic coating according to chosen formula.
protection-step-4-desc: Complete drying and polymerization. Wait 7 days before first wash.
protection-intro-text: Your vehicle's paint is constantly exposed to UV, pollution, acid rain, bird droppings and washing-related micro-scratches. Without adequate protection, it dulls, oxidizes and loses value. Our wax and ceramic treatments create a sacrificial physical barrier to preserve your paint's new condition.
protection-benefit-1-desc: Protected vehicle maintains new appearance, facilitating resale at better price.
protection-benefit-2-desc: Hydrophobic effect repels water and dirt, washing is faster and less frequent.
protection-benefit-3-desc: Protection filters harmful UV rays that are the main cause of paint aging.
protection-final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized diagnosis and discover which protection best suits your vehicle and needs.
aesthetics-hero-subtitle: Personalize and equip your vehicle according to your desires: full or partial wrapping, premium tinted windows, custom starlight ceiling, ambient LED, custom steering wheel and dashcam. Transform your interior into a unique and modern space.
aesthetics-services-subtitle: Three universes to transform and equip your vehicle according to your desires
aesthetics-service-1-desc: Change your vehicle's color with full or partial wrapping (roof, hood, wheels). Approved tinted windows for privacy, UV protection and premium aesthetics.
aesthetics-service-1-feature-4: Wide choice of shades and finishes
aesthetics-service-2-desc: Professional installation of custom steering wheel for optimal winter comfort. HD dashcam to secure your journeys with continuous recording and evidence in case of accident.
aesthetics-service-3-desc: Create a unique atmosphere with a custom fiber optic starlight ceiling. Customizable RGB ambient LED lighting for a modern and warm interior.
aesthetics-intro-text: Your vehicle reflects your personality. Aesthetic personalization and adding modern equipment allow creating a unique, comfortable and technological interior. Protection, style and functionality combine to enhance your investment and improve your daily driving experience.
aesthetics-benefit-1-text: Stand out with personalized wrapping, elegant tinted windows and custom luminous interior.
aesthetics-benefit-2-text: Wrapping protects your original paint against scratches, UV and splashes while changing color.
aesthetics-benefit-3-text: Add comfort and security with a custom steering wheel, HD dashcam and ambient LED lighting.
aesthetics-testimonial-1: Matte black wrapping on my Golf GTI. Exceptional result, impeccable installation without bubble or defect. The change is radical, looks like a new car. Very satisfied!
aesthetics-testimonial-2: Starlight ceiling + ambient LED installation in my Mercedes. The atmosphere is magical in the evening! Meticulous work and perfect result. I recommend 200% for a unique atmosphere.
aesthetics-testimonial-3: Steering wheel installed on my BMW. Invisible installation, works perfectly. Very appreciated in winter in the mountains! Professional service, deadline respected.
aesthetics-final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote and custom advice. We study together your personalization project for a result that resembles you.
covering-hero-subtitle: Transform your vehicle's appearance with full or partial wrapping. Protect your privacy and reduce heat with our approved premium tinted windows. Complete personalization, professional installation, guaranteed result.
covering-services-subtitle: Complete or customized solutions according to your desires and budget
covering-description: Full or partial wrapping with premium 3M, Avery or Hexis films. Wide choice of colors and finishes: matte, gloss, satin, chrome, carbon, metallic. Professional installation.
covering-feature-5: Finishes: matte, gloss, satin, chrome, carbon
covering-feature-6: Several film brands available on order
covering-disclaimer: Personalized quote according to vehicle and options
tinting-description: Installation of approved tinted films for rear and side windows. Several shades available (5% to 50%). Heat reduction, 99% UV protection, guaranteed privacy and premium aesthetics.
covering-intro-title: Wrapping and tinted windows: why choose?
covering-intro-text: Wrapping allows completely or partially changing your vehicle's color while protecting original paint. Tinted windows offer privacy, UV protection and thermal comfort. Two aesthetic and functional solutions to enhance your car.
covering-benefit-1-text: Matte, gloss, satin, chrome or carbon: hundreds of shades and finishes available for a unique look.
covering-benefit-2-text: Film protects bodywork against scratches, UV and splashes. Original paint preserved for resale.
covering-benefit-3-text: Tinted windows: heat reduction up to 60%, 99% UV protection, preserved privacy, increased visual comfort.
covering-gallery-title: Gallery of Our Wrapping & Windows Work
covering-testimonial-1: Full matte black wrapping on my M3. Perfect installation, not a bubble, the joints are invisible. The result is spectacular! Meticulous work, highly recommend.
covering-testimonial-2: 15% tinted windows on my SUV. The difference in thermal comfort is incredible in summer! Fast and clean installation. Perfect privacy for children in the back. Very satisfied.
covering-testimonial-3: Partial wrapping (roof + mirrors) in 3D carbon. Exceptional result, my Golf has completely changed appearance! Unbeatable value. I'm coming back for the wheels.
faq-covering-a1: Quality wrapping (3M, Avery, Hexis) lasts between 5 and 7 years depending on maintenance and usage conditions. Premium films keep their color and shine without discoloration. Regular maintenance (gentle washing, no direct high pressure) extends lifespan.
faq-covering-a2: No, on the contrary! Wrapping protects original paint against scratches, UV and splashes. When removed, paint is found intact. It's even recommended to preserve resale value. Professional installation guarantees residue-free removal.
faq-covering-q3: Can I go to automatic wash with wrapping?
faq-covering-a3: Yes, but favor brushless washes (high pressure only). Avoid aggressive rotating brushes that can lift edges. Hand washing remains ideal to preserve lifespan. No direct high-pressure on joints.
faq-tinting-a1: Yes, according to French regulations: front windows (driver/passenger) must have at least 70% light transmission. Rear windows and rear windshield can be tinted without restriction. All our films are approved and comply with highway code.
faq-tinting-q2: Which shade to choose for my windows?
faq-tinting-a2: For rear: 5-15% for maximum privacy (very dark), 20-35% for visibility/privacy compromise, 50% for light shade. We advise according to your needs: privacy, thermal protection, aesthetics. 15-20% is most popular for SUVs and sedans.
faq-tinting-q3: How long does tinted window installation take?
faq-tinting-a3: Count 2 to 3 hours for a sedan (rear windows + windshield), 3 to 4 hours for complete SUV. Film requires 48h drying: avoid lowering windows during this period. After, normal use without restriction.
covering-final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote. We study your wrapping or tinted windows project and advise you on the best solutions adapted to your needs.
steering-hero-subtitle: Add comfort and security to your vehicle. Professional installation of heated steering wheel for optimal winter comfort and HD dashcam to protect your journeys. Compatible all brands, invisible installation and warranty included.
steering-services-subtitle: Quality equipment and guaranteed professional installation
steering-service-desc: Professional installation of heated steering wheel kit compatible all brands. Fast temperature rise (30-60 seconds), several adjustable heating levels. Invisible installation with integrated wiring under steering wheel.
steering-info-note: Essential for winter comfort in mountains
dashcam-service-desc: Installation of Full HD or 4K onboard camera with night vision, G-sensor and parking mode. Continuous recording on SD card. Invisible wiring powered by battery. Front + rear dashcam option available.
dashcam-info-note: Secure your journeys and have evidence in case of incident
steering-intro-text: Heated steering wheel brings immediate winter comfort, particularly appreciated in mountains. Dashcam secures your journeys by continuously recording, providing evidence in case of accident or dispute. Two modern equipment that enhance your vehicle.
steering-benefit-1-text: Warm steering wheel in seconds. No more frozen hands in winter. Essential in mountains and cold weather.
steering-benefit-2-text: Continuous HD/4K recording of your journeys. Video evidence in case of accident, vandalism or insurance dispute.
steering-benefit-3-text: Invisible installation without visible cables. Compatible all brands. Installation and operation warranty.
steering-testimonial-1: Heated steering wheel installed on my Passat. Ultra-fast heating, invisible installation. Never frozen hands in the morning in winter! Essential in mountains. I recommend.
steering-testimonial-2: Front+rear 4K dashcam installed. Exceptional image quality even at night. Clean installation, no visible cable. I feel much safer on the road.
steering-testimonial-3: Double equipment: heated steering wheel + dashcam. Serious and careful work. Both equipment work perfectly. Comfort and safety at top. Excellent value.
faq-steering-q1: Is heated steering wheel installation compatible with my airbag?
faq-steering-a1: Yes, absolutely. Our heated steering wheel system is specifically designed not to interfere with airbag. Installation is done under steering wheel cover without touching safety systems. All checks are performed after installation to guarantee proper airbag operation.
faq-steering-q2: How long does it take for steering wheel to heat?
faq-steering-a2: Steering wheel starts heating in 30 to 60 seconds depending on model. Optimal temperature is reached in 2-3 minutes maximum. You generally have 3 adjustable heating levels to adjust according to your preferences and outside temperature.
faq-steering-q3: Does heated steering wheel consume much battery?
faq-steering-a3: No, consumption is very low (about 30-50W), equivalent to rear window defogger. System automatically stops after 30-45 minutes to avoid overconsumption. No impact on battery or alternator, even with daily use.
faq-dashcam-a1: Yes, dashcam records in loop on SD card. When card is full, old files are automatically overwritten by new ones. In case of impact (G-sensor), current recording is automatically protected and won't be overwritten. You always keep important moments.
faq-dashcam-q2: Does dashcam work when vehicle is off?
faq-dashcam-a2: Yes, with parking mode. Dashcam stays on standby and activates automatically upon motion or impact detection during parking. This mode requires direct battery connection (installation we perform). Ideal to monitor your vehicle against vandalism or parking accidents.
faq-dashcam-a3: Yes, dashcam videos are increasingly accepted as evidence by insurance and courts in France. They allow clearly establishing responsibilities in case of accident. Check with your insurance, some even offer discounts for vehicles equipped with dashcam.
steering-final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote. We advise you on the best equipment adapted to your vehicle and needs. Fast installation and warranty.
starlight-hero-subtitle: Transform your interior into a unique space with a fiber optic starlight ceiling and customizable RGB ambient LED. Custom installation, magical atmosphere and total control of colors and intensities. Create the ambiance of your dreams.
starlight-services-subtitle: Custom solutions for a unique and modern interior
starlight-service-description: Installation of customized fiber optic starlight ceiling in roof lining. Hundreds of light points creating realistic Milky Way effect. Several colors and modes available. Non-invasive custom installation.
starlight-feature-1: 200 to 800 optical fibers according to project
starlight-note: Replicates Rolls-Royce and Mercedes Maybach effect
led-service-description: Installation of customizable RGB LED strips in interior: floor, doors, dashboard, seats. Millions of colors, dynamic modes, music synchronization. Control via remote or smartphone app.
led-note: Create the perfect atmosphere for every moment
starlight-intro-title: Why Install Starlight Ceiling and Ambient LED?
starlight-intro-text: Starlight ceiling creates unique fairy-tale atmosphere, particularly popular in high-end vehicles. RGB ambient LED allow personalizing interior lighting according to your desires and mood. Two solutions for modern, warm and impressive interior.
starlight-benefit-1-text: Create magical and soothing ambiance. Customizable 'Milky Way' effect with hundreds of optical fibers.
starlight-benefit-2-text: RGB LED: millions of colors, adjustable intensity, dynamic modes. Adapt ambiance to your desires via remote.
starlight-benefit-3-text: High-end equipment that enhances your vehicle. Guaranteed 'wow' effect with your passengers.
starlight-testimonial-1: 600-fiber starlight ceiling in my S-Class. Breathtaking result! Effect is identical to Maybach. My passengers are systematically impressed. Careful and discreet installation.
starlight-testimonial-2: Complete RGB ambient LED in my Audi. Magical atmosphere in the evening! I love changing colors according to my mood. Invisible installation, no visible cable. I recommend 100%.
starlight-testimonial-3: Complete starlight ceiling + ambient LED pack. My interior is totally transformed! Unique atmosphere, especially at night. Artist work, perfect finishes. Excellent value.
faq-starlight-a1: Roof lining is carefully removed, then we drill tiny holes to insert optical fibers one by one. Fibers are connected to LED light generator hidden in trunk or under seat. Installation is non-invasive and reversible. Headliner is then replaced without any visible trace.
faq-starlight-q2: How many optical fibers are needed?
faq-starlight-a2: It depends on desired effect: 200-300 fibers for light and discreet effect, 400-600 fibers for realistic effect (recommended), 700-1000 fibers for dense and spectacular 'Milky Way' effect. We advise according to your headliner size and desired result.
faq-starlight-q3: Does starlight ceiling consume much energy?
faq-starlight-a3: No, consumption is very low (about 5-15W depending on fiber number), equivalent to LED dome light. Modern LED system is ultra-economical. No battery impact, even with prolonged use. You can leave starlight ceiling on without risk.
faq-led-q1: Can ambient LED be installed on any vehicle?
faq-led-a1: Yes, ambient LED are universal and compatible with all vehicles. Installation adapts to your interior: floor, doors, dashboard, seats. LED strips are thin and flexible, allowing to follow all contours. Wiring is invisible, concealed in existing trims.
faq-led-q2: How do you control ambient LED?
faq-led-a2: Via infrared remote (supplied) or smartphone app depending on kit. You can change color, intensity, mode (fixed, gradient, pulsation, music synchronization). Settings are memorized: at startup, LED automatically resume your last parameters.
faq-combined-q1: Can starlight ceiling and ambient LED be combined?
faq-combined-a1: Absolutely! It's even recommended for spectacular effect. Starlight ceiling on ceiling combined with ambient LED on floor and doors creates unique immersive atmosphere. We offer combined packs at advantageous rates. Both systems are independently controllable.
starlight-final-cta-text: Contact us for personalized quote. We study your starlight ceiling and/or ambient LED project to create the interior of your dreams. Guaranteed custom installation.
gallery-hero-subtitle: Discover our detailing, cleaning, polishing and ceramic protection work on all types of vehicles
gallery-instagram-text: Discover our real-time work, our spectacular before/after and behind the scenes of our workshop!
gallery-cta-title: Want the Same Result for Your Vehicle?
gallery-cta-text: Contact us now for a personalized and free quote
gallery-testimonial-1: Exceptional work on my Porsche. Polishing and ceramic protection transformed the car. Professional and passionate team. Highly recommend!
gallery-testimonial-2: Comfort Plus Delivery service is great! They picked up my car at home and brought it back impeccable. Installed starlight ceiling is magnificent. Thanks Pauline and Osama!
gallery-testimonial-3: Complete wrapping of my SUV, result beyond my expectations. Perfect finishes, wise advice. Reasonable prices for quality of work. I'll be back!

form-message-placeholder: Describe your project or ask us your questions...

contact-testimonial-2: Comfort Plus Delivery service is great! They picked up my car at home and brought it back impeccable. Installed starlight ceiling is magnificent. Thanks Pauline and Osama!
contact-testimonial-3: Complete wrapping of my SUV, result beyond my expectations. Perfect finishes, wise advice. Reasonable prices for quality of work. I'll be back!
404-description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. But don't worry, we can help you find your way!
cgu-subtitle: Terms of use of the car-style74.com website
cgu-preamble-text: These Terms of Use (hereinafter 'TOU') aim to define the terms and conditions of use of the website car-style74.com (hereinafter the 'Site'), published by Car Style company. Use of the Site implies full acceptance of these TOU.
cgu-article1-text: The Site aims to present services offered by Car Style in the field of automotive aesthetics: cleaning, polishing, ceramic protection, wrapping, tinted windows, starlight ceiling and automotive accessories. It also allows users to contact the company and request quotes.
cgu-article2-text-1: The Site is freely accessible to any user with Internet access. All costs incurred by the user to access the service (computer equipment, software, Internet connection, etc.) are their responsibility.
cgu-article2-text-2: Car Style implements all reasonable means at its disposal to ensure quality access to the Site, but is not obliged to succeed. Car Style cannot be held responsible for any network or server malfunction or any other event beyond reasonable control, which would prevent or degrade Site access.
cgu-article3-text-1: The user undertakes to use the Site in accordance with its purpose and these TOU. They specifically refrain from:
cgu-article3-list-1: • Using the Site in an unlawful or fraudulent manner
cgu-article3-list-2: • Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the Site or its servers
cgu-article3-list-3: • Transmitting viruses, malware or any malicious code
cgu-article3-list-4: • Collecting or storing personal data relating to other users
cgu-article3-list-5: • Reproducing, copying or exploiting Site content without prior written authorization
cgu-article4-text-1: All Site elements (structure, texts, images, videos, logos, trademarks, databases, etc.) are exclusive property of Car Style or its partners. These elements are protected by intellectual property laws.
cgu-article4-text-2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of Site elements, regardless of means or process used, is prohibited, except prior written authorization from Car Style. Any unauthorized exploitation of the Site or any of its elements will be considered counterfeiting and prosecuted according to provisions of articles L.335-2 and following of the Intellectual Property Code.
cgu-article5-text-1: Personal data collected via the Site is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy and General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
cgu-article5-text-2: Collected information is subject to computer processing exclusively intended for processing your contact or quote request. Data recipients are only Car Style teams.
cgu-article5-text-3: Your data is kept for 2 years from collection.
cgu-article5-text-4: In accordance with 'computer and freedoms' law, you have right to access, rectify, port and erase your data or limit processing. You can also, for legitimate reasons, object to processing of data concerning you. You can exercise these rights by contacting us at: carstyle740@gmail.com
cgu-article6-text-1: The Site uses cookies, including Google Analytics, to improve user experience and analyze site traffic. These cookies only collect anonymized data.
cgu-article6-text-2: Users can disable cookies at any time by configuring their browser settings. However, disabling cookies may alter certain Site functionalities.
cgu-article7-text-1: The Site may contain hyperlinks to other websites (social networks, partners, etc.). Car Style exercises no control over these sites and disclaims all responsibility for their content, availability or privacy policy.
cgu-article7-text-2: Creating hyperlinks to the Site is subject to prior written authorization from Car Style.
cgu-article8-text-1: Car Style strives to ensure accuracy and updating of information published on the Site. However, Car Style cannot guarantee accuracy, precision or completeness of information present on the Site.
cgu-article8-text-2: Car Style cannot be held responsible for:
cgu-article8-list-1: • Any direct or indirect damage resulting from Site use
cgu-article8-list-3: • Any data loss or malicious intrusion
cgu-article8-list-4: • Any prejudice resulting from error or omission in information available on Site
cgu-article9-text: Car Style reserves right to modify these TOU at any time. New TOU will take effect upon publication on Site. Users are therefore advised to regularly consult latest TOU version available on Site.
cgu-article10-title: Article 10 - Applicable Law and Competent Jurisdiction
cgu-article10-text: These TOU are governed by French law. In case of dispute relating to interpretation or execution hereof, and failing amicable agreement, French courts will have sole jurisdiction.
cgu-article11-text-1: For any question regarding these TOU, you can contact us:
cgu-article11-address-details: Car Style, 133 Rue Dominique Cancellieri, 74700 Sallanches
cgv-main-subtitle: Conditions applicable to Car Style 74 services
cgv-preamble-text: These Terms of Sale (hereinafter 'TOS') govern contractual relations between Car Style company (hereinafter 'Service Provider') and any natural or legal person wishing to benefit from its services (hereinafter 'Customer'). Any service order implies unreserved acceptance of these TOS.
art1-p1: These TOS aim to define parties' rights and obligations in automotive aesthetics service sales offered by Car Style, including:
art1-li7: • Starlight ceiling and ambient LED installation
art2-p1: Any quote established by Service Provider is free and valid for 30 days from issue date. Quote details service nature, estimated duration and TTC price.
art2-p2: Order is considered final only after express quote acceptance by Customer (handwritten, electronic signature or written agreement) and deposit payment if required.
art2-p3: Service Provider reserves right to refuse any order for legitimate reason (availability, vehicle condition incompatible with service, etc.).
art3-p1: Service prices are indicated in euros, all taxes included (TTC). They are firm and final at quote validation, except agreed modification between parties.
art3-p2: Rates may be revised at any time. However, applicable price is that in effect at order validation.
art3-p3: Services are billed according to Customer request and may vary according to vehicle type, condition and chosen options.
art4-p2: For certain services (wrapping, starlight ceiling, complex installations), 30% to 50% deposit may be requested at order.
art4-p3: Service balance is payable at vehicle delivery, except contrary agreement between parties.
art5-p1: Execution deadlines are communicated indicatively when establishing quote. Service Provider strives to respect these deadlines, but delays may occur due to circumstances beyond its control (unforeseen technical difficulties, weather conditions, etc.).
art5-p2: Delay in service execution cannot give rise to order cancellation or damages payment, except in case of manifestly abusive delay attributable to Service Provider.
art6-p1: Services are performed by appointment only, in Service Provider workshop located in Combloux or on site if Customer opts for 'Comfort Plus Delivery' service.
art6-p2: Home vehicle pick-up and delivery service (Comfort Plus Delivery) is available on request. This service is paid and its rate varies according to distance from Combloux workshop.
art6-p3: Customer undertakes to deliver vehicle in condition allowing service realization. Service Provider reserves right to refuse or adapt service if vehicle condition doesn't allow realization in satisfactory conditions.
art7-p1: At vehicle delivery, Customer is invited to verify performed service conformity. Any reservation or claim must be made in writing (email or mail) within 48 hours following delivery.
art7-p2: Past this deadline, service will be considered compliant and accepted by Customer.
art8-p1: Service Provider guarantees that services will be performed according to art rules and with quality professional products.
art8-p2: Specific warranties (ceramic protection duration, wrapping lifespan, etc.) are specified in quote and depend on Customer's respect of communicated maintenance recommendations.
art8-p3: Warranty doesn't cover damages resulting from abnormal vehicle use, lack of maintenance, unauthorized external intervention or accident.
art9-p1: Service Provider is insured for professional activity. Its liability can only be engaged in case of proven fault in service execution.
art9-p2: Service Provider cannot be held responsible for:
art9-li1: • Pre-existing damages not reported by Customer
art9-li2: • Manufacturing defects or normal vehicle wear
art9-li3: • Thefts or damages to objects left in vehicle
art9-li4: • Damages related to vehicle maintenance defect after service
art10-p1: In accordance with article L221-28 of Consumer Code, right of withdrawal doesn't apply to fully executed service services before withdrawal deadline end and whose execution started with Customer's express prior agreement.
art11-p1: Any appointment cancellation or postponement by Customer must be notified at least 48 hours before scheduled date. In case of late cancellation or no-show without valid reason, paid deposit remains acquired to Service Provider.
art11-p2: In case of impossibility for Service Provider to honor appointment (illness, force majeure), Customer will be informed as soon as possible and new appointment will be agreed. If no postponement is possible, any deposit will be fully refunded.
art12-p1: Service Provider reserves right to use photographs and videos of vehicles after services for communication purposes (website, social networks, advertising materials), except Customer's written opposition. No Customer personal data will be disclosed.
art13-p1: Personal data collected in commercial relationship context is processed in accordance with GDPR. It's exclusively intended for order management and customer relationship.
art13-p2: Customer has right to access, rectify, delete and oppose their personal data, which they can exercise by contacting: carstyle740@gmail.com
art14-p1: In case of dispute, Customer can resort to conventional mediation or any other alternative dispute resolution mode.
art14-p2: In accordance with article L. 612-1 of Consumer Code, Customer can also use free consumer mediator under Service Provider's authority.
art14-p3: Failing amicable resolution, dispute will be brought before competent French courts.
art15-p1: Service Provider reserves right to modify these TOS at any time. Applicable TOS are those in effect at order time.
art16-p1: These TOS are subject to French law. Any dispute relating to their interpretation or execution falls under exclusive jurisdiction of French courts.
cgv-contact-p1: For any question regarding these TOS:
cgv-contact-address-details: Car Style, 133 Rue Dominique Cancellieri, 74700 Sallanches
legal-subtitle: Legal information relating to car-style74.com website
legal-sect1-ape-value: 4520A - Maintenance and repair of light motor vehicles
legal-sect6-p1: All content present on car-style74.com website (texts, images, videos, logos, graphics, etc.) are exclusive property of Car Style or its partners and are protected by French and international copyright.
legal-sect6-p2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication or adaptation of all or part of website elements, regardless of means or process used, is prohibited without prior written authorization from Car Style.
legal-sect7-p1: In accordance with General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Computer and Freedoms law, you have right to access, rectify, delete and oppose personal data concerning you.
legal-sect7-p2: Information collected via contact form is used only to process your request and is kept for 2 years.
legal-sect7-p3: To exercise your rights, you can contact us at: carstyle740@gmail.com
legal-sect8-p1: Website uses Google Analytics to analyze audience and improve our services. These cookies only collect anonymized data.
legal-sect8-p2: You can disable these cookies at any time via your browser settings.
legal-sect9-p1: Car Style strives to ensure accuracy and updating of information published on this website. However, Car Style cannot guarantee accuracy, precision or completeness of information made available on this website.
legal-sect9-p2: Consequently, Car Style disclaims all responsibility for any inaccuracy, inaccuracy or omission concerning information available on website.
legal-sect10-p1: These legal notices are governed by French law. In case of dispute, French courts will have sole jurisdiction.
footer-about-text: Premium automotive detailing specialists in Combloux. We restore your vehicle with passion and expertise for several years.
footer-delivery-text: We pick up and deliver your vehicle directly to your home or workplace.
footer-zone-cities:
Combloux • Megève • Chamonix • Sallanches
Saint-Gervais • Passy • Haute-Savoie
